alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. * This may cause sharp rises along small creeks and streams in low lying flood prone areas. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... McKinnon and Bay Springs. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
